newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Santa Isabel upped.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Santa Isabel upped.

text.p: ING Barings analyst William McCone has raised his rating for Chilean supermarket chain to buy from hold.
-- In a May 22 report, McCone wrote that the strategic alliance with the Velox Group, which controls the Disco chain, would improve operating efficiencies.
-- "We feel that Santa Isabel is undervalued trading at 16 times our 1997 earnings estimate," he wrote.
-- "The company will continue to undergo strong growth over the next three years and its strategic alliance with the Velox Group will help improve operating efficiencies."
-- He set a 12-month price target of $31. The company's American Depositary Receipts closed Thursday at 26.
